00020 namespace random_utilities
00021 {
00022     // global variables for maintaining random number state
00023     seed_t erand_state;
00024     seed_t nrand_state;
00025     seed_t jrand_state;

00033 #define RAND_NAME random_name::NAME
00034 #define RAND_CPRINT(fmt, args...)  CPRINT_WITH_NAME(RAND_NAME, fmt, ##args)

00048 // Seeding
00050 
00051 void
00052 random_utilities::seed_erand48(const seed_t &p)
00053 {
00054     erand_state =  p;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void
00058 random_utilities::seed_nrand48(const seed_t &p)
00059 {
00060     nrand_state =  p;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void
00064 random_utilities::seed_jrand48(const seed_t &p)
00065 {
00066     jrand_state = p;
00067 }
00068 
00073 void
00074 random_utilities::seed_all(const seed_t &p)
00075 {
00076     seed_erand48(p);    // double [0.0, 1.0) -- uniform distribution
00077     seed_nrand48(p);    // unsigned long between 0 and 2^31 -- uniform
00078     seed_jrand48(p);    // signed long between -2^31 and 2^31 -- uniform
00079 }
00080 
00082 // Template Specialization
00083 //
00084 // Okay, from the Templates book, you can only put the declaration for
00085 // a specialization in the header: body *must* be in .cpp file, or you
00086 // will get "multiple declaration" errors from the linker (which I
00087 // got).
00088 //
00089 // And they have to be within the "namespace random {}" junk because
00090 // if you try and qualify the template with random:: you get an error
00091 // about "non-templates used as templates".
00093 
00094 namespace random_utilities
00095 {
00096 
00105 template <typename T>
00106 T
00107 get_random(void)
00108 {
00109     return static_cast<T>(erand48(erand_state.s) * static_cast<T>(~0));
00110 }
00111 
00113 // char && uchar: 8 bits
00115 
00127 template<>
00128 signed char
00129 get_random(void)
00130 {
00131     return static_cast<signed char>(get_random() * UCHAR_MAX + SCHAR_MIN);
00132 }
00133 
00138 template<>
00139 unsigned char
00140 get_random(void)
00141 {
00142     return static_cast<unsigned char>(get_random() * UCHAR_MAX);
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00147 // short && ushort: 16 bits
00149 
00154 template<>
00155 short
00156 get_random(void)
00157 {
00158     return static_cast<short>(get_random() * USHRT_MAX + SHRT_MAX);
00159 }
00160 
00165 template<>
00166 unsigned short
00167 get_random(void)
00168 {
00169     return static_cast<unsigned short>(get_random() * USHRT_MAX);
00170 }
00171 
00173 // int && uint: 32 bits
00175 
00180 template<>
00181 int
00182 get_random(void)
00183 {
00184     return static_cast<int>(jrand48(jrand_state.s));
00185 }
00186 
00191 template<>
00192 long
00193 get_random(void)
00194 {
00195     return jrand48(jrand_state.s);
00196 }
00197 
00202 template<>
00203 unsigned int
00204 get_random(void)
00205 {
00206     return static_cast<unsigned int>(jrand48(jrand_state.s));
00207 }
00208 
00213 template<>
00214 unsigned long
00215 get_random(void)
00216 {
00217     return static_cast<unsigned long>(nrand48(nrand_state.s));
00218 }
00219 
00224 unsigned int
00225 get_random(unsigned int max)
00226 {
00227     return static_cast<int>(max * get_random());
00228 }
00229 
00230 }   // end "random_utilities" namespace

00234 
00235 std::ostream &
00236 random_utilities::operator <<(std::ostream &o, const seed_t &t)
00237 {
00238     o << "\n"
00239       << "1st == " << t[0] << " "
00240       << "2nd == " << t[1] << " "
00241       << "3rd == " << t[2]
00242       << "\n";
00243     return o;
00244 }

00247 // Comparison
00249 
00257 bool
00258 random_utilities::random_gt(const double odds)
00259 {
00260     return erand48(erand_state.s) > odds;
00261 }
00262 
00270 bool
00271 random_utilities::random_gte(const double odds)
00272 {
00273     return erand48(erand_state.s) >= odds;
00274 }
00275 
00282 bool
00283 random_utilities::random_lt(const double odds)
00284 {
00285     return erand48(erand_state.s) < odds;
00286 }
00287 
00295 bool
00296 random_utilities::random_lte(const double odds)
00297 {
00298     return  erand48(erand_state.s) <= odds;
00299 }

00302 
00315 double
00316 spread_random(void)
00317 {
00318     return (2.0 * random_utilities::get_random()) - 1.0;
00319 }
00320 
00325 double
00326 random_utilities::get_random(void)
00327 {
00328     return erand48(erand_state.s);
00329 }
